title: Jungle & sea of grasses (compilation)
creator_credit: Richard Mattheus, Andrew Neal and BBC
brief_description: Presents the ecology of jungles, savanna grasslands and deserts. Teachers advised to view in advance so that segments may be identified as appropriate to concentration spans. Narrated by David Attemborough
